column4: Now I get "dependency is not satisfiable g++ (>=4:4.43) when I install that .deb :(
do an update of the respo´s
I cannot.. without an Internet connection

apt-get install checks your sources, and tries to fetch the packages from those repositories. And if those are on the internet, you NEED and internet connection on your machine, to be able to fetch the packages (and check those repo´s). :)
